com.xnx3.net

类 FastDFSUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xnx3.net.FastDFSUtil

  • public class FastDFSUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    FastDFS快速使用 
                    //加入配置文件 src/xnx3Config.xml  ，配置其FastDFS节点的参数。

                FastDFSUtil client=new FastDFSUtil();
                client.open();
                //上传
                UploadBean upload = client.upload("/jar_file/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar");
                //下载
                boolean result=client.download("M00/07/65/CgAA-lVRp9-AYn-mAAPCLZlIvsE337.txt", "/Users/apple/Desktop/t/1.jar");
                client.close();

    需
    fastdfs.jar
    commons-configuration-1.7.jar
    commons-collections-3.2.1.jar
    commons-io-1.3.2.jar
    commons-lang-2.5.jar
    commons-logging-1.2.jar
    作者:
    管雷鸣

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FastDFSUtil

        public FastDFSUtil()

    • 方法详细资料

      • open

        public void open()
        打开服务

      • close

        public void close()
        停止，关闭Socket

      • upload

        public UploadBean upload(java.lang.String local_filename)
        文件上传
        参数:
        local_filename - 要上传的本地文件绝对路径
        返回:
        UploadBean
      • UploadBean.isSuccess():判断是否上传成功

      • upload

        public UploadBean upload(byte[] file_buff,
                java.lang.String file_ext_name)
        文件上传
        参数:
        file_buff - byte[]
        fix_ext_name - 文件后缀名,不包含"."
        返回:
        UploadBean
      • UploadBean.isSuccess():判断是否上传成功
        • 另请参阅:
        StorageClient.upload_file(byte[], String, NameValuePair[])

      • download

        public boolean download(java.lang.String remoteFileName,
               java.lang.String localFileName)
        download file
        参数:
        remoteFileName - such as : M00/07/65/CgAA-lVRoGGAaCboAAAADv4ZzcQ734.txt
        localFileName - such as : /Users/apple/Desktop/t/1.txt
        返回:
        true:成功；false:失败
        另请参阅:
        StorageClient.download_file(String, String, String)

      • download

        public byte[] download(java.lang.String remoteFileName)
        download file
        参数:
        remoteFileName - such as : M00/07/65/CgAA-lVRoGGAaCboAAAADv4ZzcQ734.txt
        返回:
        byte[] , 若是返回null则为失败
        另请参阅:
        StorageClient.download_file(String, String)

      • delete

        public boolean delete(java.lang.String remoteFileName)
        删除文件
        参数:
        remoteFileName - filename on storage server
        返回:
        boolean
        另请参阅:
        StorageClient.delete_file(String, String)

      • getFileInfo

        public org.csource_.fastdfs.FileInfo getFileInfo(java.lang.String remoteFileName)
        查看文件信息
        参数:
        remoteFileName - filename on storage server
        返回:
        FileInfo object for success, return null for fail
        另请参阅:
        StorageClient.get_file_info(String, String)

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
